title: Check for Duplicates in a List
description: In Python, a list is a collection of items that are ordered and changeable. Sometimes, we need to check if a list contains duplicate values. In this challenge, you will write a function that checks if a list has any duplicates.

meta.title: Python List Duplicate Checker | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Discover how to check for duplicates in Python lists with a simple and efficient function. Enhance your programming skills with this informative tutorial.
meta.keywords: python, list, duplicate, check, programming, tutorial
